sentences.chinese: 在藏語中，“納木錯”是“天上之湖”的意思。

sentences.english: It is famous for its high altitude and imposing scenery.
sentences.chinese: 納木錯以其高海拔和令人窒息的美景而聲名遠揚。

sentences.english: Namucuo is a large precious mirror besetting on Northern Tibet Grassland.
sentences.chinese: 納木錯如鑲嵌在藏北草原上的一面巨大寶鏡。
